mapper.insert: insert into SAILTOTM.TransportDetails (stuff_id, carrier_id, transport_id, location_id, width, height, length, weight, estimated_transport_cost, transport_cost, transport_status, transport_cost_paid_date, measure_date) values (#{stuffId}, #{carrierId}, #{transportId}, #{locationId}, #{width}, #{height}, #{length}, #{weight}, #{estimatedTransportCost}, #{transportCost}, #{transportStatus}, #{transportCostPaidDate}, #{measureDate})
mapper.update: update SAILTOTM.TransportDetails set width = #{width}, TransportDetails.height = #{height}, TransportDetails.length = #{length}, TransportDetails.weight = #{weight} where transport_detail_id = (select Orders.transport_detail_id from SAILTOTM.Orders where order_id = #{id})
